segments.text: Hello , JC Consulting PLC . Chris Edwards speaking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr Edwards , this is Kristy calling from IBA .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you remember coming in to do the L / C amendment last week ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The negotiating bank has just been in touch ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , dear ! There isn't a problem , is there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , Mr Edwards , not at all . We are contacting you to let you know that everything has gone smoothly and the amendment has been accepted .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Kristy , that's wonderful ! Thanks so much for contacting me personally .
segments.speaker: S1
